when_to_say: Used to refer to a medical facility.
example: أنا في المستشفى. (ana fi al-mustashfa.) - I am at the hospital.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a medical professional.
example: الطبيب يعالج المرضى. (al-tabib yu'alej al-marda.) - The doctor treats the patients.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a person who is ill.
example: هو مريض في السرير. (huwa marid fi al-sareer.) - He is sick in bed.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a substance used for medical treatment.
example: أحتاج إلى دواء. (ahtaj ila dawa'a.) - I need medicine.

when_to_say: Used to describe physical or emotional suffering.
example: أشعر بألم في رأسي. (ash'ur bi'alam fi ra'si.) - I have a pain in my head.

when_to_say: Used to describe medical care given to a patient.
example: العلاج ضروري للشفاء. (al-ilaj daruri lil-shifa') - Treatment is necessary for recovery.

when_to_say: Used to describe a medical operation.
example: لقد خضع لعملية جراحية. (laqad khadha'a li 'amaliya jaraheya.) - He underwent surgery.

when_to_say: Used to describe the process of medical evaluation.
example: أجريت فحصا طبيا. (ajrayt fahsan tibyan.) - I had a medical examination.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a person's physical and mental condition.
example: الصحة مهمة. (al-siha muhimma.) - Health is important.

when_to_say: Used to refer to the state of a person or thing.
example: حالتي الصحية جيدة. (halati al-sihiya jayyida.) - My health condition is good.
